pkgmetadata.longdescription: Symmetric Transformation of Tails for Plotting Differences // When plotting treated-minus-control differences, after-minus- before changes, or difference-in-differences, the ttrans() function symmetrically transforms the positive and negative tails to aid plotting. The package includes an observational study with three control groups and an unaffected outcome; see Rosenbaum (2020) doi:10.1111/biom.13558.
